section.name: Extending VODesktop
section.p: VODesktop can be extended with new functionality by using the -addModule or -addModuleURL commandline flags to add additional hivemind XML modules. These descriptors can contribute to existing configuration points, provide new implementations for existing service points, or add completely new service points.
To see the possible extension points, consult the hivedoc, and read the hivemind documentation
Obviously, if the additional hivemind modules specify new java classes, these must be added to the classpath.
